message: New bid of $55,000 on your 2022 Ford Mustang Mach-E!
A buyer is interested in your 2019 Honda Civic and has sent you a message.
Your listing for the 2024 Chevrolet Silverado has received an offer of $42,000.
The auction for your 2021 Toyota RAV4 will end in 12 hours.
Payment confirmed for your 2023 Tesla Model S. Please arrange vehicle delivery.
